lyrics:
12 contributorsstoplight lyricsintro

and if you come back right then we can boogie boogie boogie
when i pull up to the stoplight
i gotta have the paper right paper right
and if you come back right then we can boogie boogie boogie

snoop dogg
boogie boogie boogie im goin 65 75 80

tryna keep the timin on the track with the diamond in the back
moon roof wide open scopin locin
the bitches believe the hoes keep hopin

fo hoes on the block tryna put they bid in
girl put it to work you gon do the damn thing
hop in the rest of yall eat dirt

show my do and if not its ho by go
aint a ho out there that can slow my flow

reach for my thang in my glove compartment
didnt have to use it blasted my music
kids in the streets askin  doggy how i dooze it
first place in the race and dont wanna lose it
niggas better watch out and bitches better mooooove it

yeah baby you gots ta move your groove
to prove that you supposed to groove in the move
as i recite naughty nothings in yo eardrums
if you cruisin up the boulevard in your car
put it in park and let the dogg spark

ohhhhhhh noooooo not the track of funk
i am sir dunk dpg funk
and i hate stoplight

half past late and im still rollin
real hon make a nigga pocket still swollen

cause imma don sippin moet smokin chron

half tank of gas
rollin down the window reach out and spank that ass
gettin hot turn down the heat burn down the street
my hoes love to earn my keep
its only five miles left so i whipped it
skipped it flipped it in ovedrive
straight bonafide pimp nigga on the rise
85 95 100 and good night and fuck that stoplight
car crashesembed
